name: Swamp Frenzy
description:
Description:

I made this prototype myself with the theme of One Time Use in mind.

 Your froggy character can't swim too well and can only move by hopping onto lily pads.

Unfortunately they sink when you jump on them so you can only use a lily pad once.

Your goal is to escape the alligators by reaching the exit.

You might have to click on the game window with your mouse before the game starts reading your input.

Thanks for playing.

Music: RoccoW

Instructions: 

Use the arrow keys or A-S-D-W to move the character.

Eat the bugs to unlock the exit.

Reach the red lily pad to progress to the next level.

There are 8 challenging levels to complete.

Hints:

Try to get a good rhythm going when hopping, tapping as fast as you can doesn't work as well.

If you get stuck, try to find another path through the level.

The alligators can be trapped or corralled which can give you time to reach the goal.
